trans-unit.source: Language, literature, programming languages, software development... Have you ever thought about seeing such things together? Well, I have dealt with both for a while.
trans-unit.target: Language, literature, programming languages, software development... Have you ever thought about seeing such things together? Well, I have dealt with both for a while.

trans-unit.source: I have developed this site to share my thoughts and experience on translation from English to Portuguese, and to some extent, translation in general for software localization.
trans-unit.target: I have developed this site to share my thoughts and experience on translation from English to Portuguese, and to some extent, translation in general for software localization.

trans-unit.source: I also share some hopefully relevant knowledge and insight in the Portuguese language, especially the variation spoken in Brazil.
trans-unit.target: I also share some hopefully relevant knowledge and insight in the Portuguese language, especially the variation spoken in Brazil.

trans-unit.source: My name is Geocarlos. I have worked as an English-Portuguese translator since 2007. In 2009, with ICanLocalize, an online translation/localization service provided by OnTheGo Systems, which is a company based in Las Vegas, I started working in projects for the localization of mobile applications, especially iOS and Android apps, and websites. I have a degree in English and Portuguese language and literature, and a graduate certificate in English-Portuguese translation.
trans-unit.target: My name is Geocarlos. I have worked as an English-Portuguese translator since 2007. In 2009, with ICanLocalize, an online translation/localization service provided by OnTheGo Systems, which is a company based in Las Vegas, I started working in projects for the localization of mobile applications, especially iOS and Android apps, and websites. I have a degree in English and Portuguese language and literature, and a graduate certificate in English-Portuguese translation.

trans-unit.source: In August 2017, I completed a undergraduate program in system development. I have developed some skills in Java, JavaScript (DOM and Node, with Express) and TypeScript (with Angular and Ionic). I have learned and praticed Ionic and Cordova on my own, developing hybrid mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: In August 2017, I completed a undergraduate program in system development. I have developed some skills in Java, JavaScript (DOM and Node, with Express) and TypeScript (with Angular and Ionic). I have learned and praticed Ionic and Cordova on my own, developing hybrid mobile apps.

trans-unit.source: Besides translation projects, I am also interested in entry level jobs as a software developer. As an English-Portuguese translator, I have a vast experience, including projects with over 100,000 words. Some of the companies I have worked with through ICanLocalize are HunterLab (website, PDF brochures), SkyFold (website), Kakao (iOS and Android app), Entec Polymers (website), Grand Hotel et de Milan, to mention just a few. I am willing to take tests before getting hired for any project.

Some of the companies I have worked with through ICanLocalize are HunterLab (website, PDF brochures), SkyFold (website), Kakao (iOS and Android app), Entec Polymers (website), Grand Hotel et de Milan, to mention just a few. I am willing to take tests before getting hired for any project.
